description:
Work hard, play hard. These durable socks keep your feet comfortable during demanding weeks.

  • Synthetic and cotton blend wicks moisture to keep feet cool and dry
  • Performance Cushioning combines impact protection with comfort to keep you pushing
  • Infiknit™ construction adds durability to high-friction areas
  • Seamless toe closure for hotspot- and chafe-free wear
  • Includes 3 pairs of socks
name: Stance Athletic Tab Socks 3-Pack - Unisex
